meanings.definition: The quality or state of being ample or spacious.
meanings.sent1: The ampleness of the room allowed for comfortable movement.
meanings.sent2: The ampleness of the field provided a sense of freedom.
meanings.sent3: The picnic basket was surprised by the ampleness of the park.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt the ampleness of love surrounding her.
meanings.sent5: The ampleness of the ocean stretched endlessly before them.

meanings.definition: The extent or degree of being ample or abundant.
meanings.sent1: The ampleness of food at the party impressed the guests.
meanings.sent2: The ampleness of resources in the region was a blessing.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was amazed by the ampleness of acorns in the tree.
meanings.sent4: His laughter filled the room with an ampleness of joy.
meanings.sent5: The ampleness of stars in the night sky took her breath away.
